name: Cyber League Football
description:
Robot football at its best! Play in multi-season franchise, take on the explosive Headhunter mode, or just jump into quick-play to get in some fast action. Earn money and upgrade your robots in-game! Beware of taking too many hits, or you'll explode and find your robots laying in pieces all over the field.

Quick Play

Quickly jump into a single game with any team against any other team. if you have a franchise going, quick play rosters will be based on the current franchise, so you can further experience your franchise universe! Ideal for local multiplayer games against your friends!

Franchise

Franchise mode is where you'll spend season after season trying to upgrade your team and work your way up the 100 team league ladder. Get to the top, and you'll earn a new trophy for the trophy room. Unlock new teams for franchise mode by beating much higher ranked teams.

Headhunter

Headhunter is the mode you want if you're into explosions! Each team start with fully upgraded rosters, but there's a catch. EVERY ROBOT IS 1 HIT FROM BLOWING UP!!!! The goal is to manage your losses throughout the game and create mismatches to exploit. It's a BLAST!

Trophy Room

You need a place to see everything you've accomplished, so make sure to visit the trophy room. Here's where all your career achievements will be saved, for bragging rights!
